attributes.action: alter plans of action allowing the government to invest money to teaching immigrants English, or to make the groups of people pay a fee of atleast 25% themselves.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It has recently been disclosed that the UK government will begin to invest money to in-coming immigrants to learn English.
I feel that these groups of people should pay atleast 25% of their learning costs to allow money to go back to the government whom can spend it on other public services.
I have yet to see another country whom would pay for us to learn their language upon living there.
